mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REBOARD ( SEQID ,CMMT ,PASS ,WRITER ,RDATE ,PSEQID ,STAR ) VALUES( REBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{cmmt} ,#{pass} ,#{writer} ,sysdate ,#{pseqid} ,#{star} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MYBOARD SET HITS=HITS+1 WHERE SEQID=#{seqid}
UPDATE MYBOARD SET TITLE ='작성자에 의한 삭제' ,CONTENT = '' WHERE SEQID = #{seqid}
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT SEQID ,TITLE ,PASS ,WRITER ,CONTENT ,HITS ,TO_CHAR(RDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE ,TO_CHAR(UDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') UDATE ,(select count(*) from REBOARD where PSEQID=M.SEQID) RCNT FROM MYBOARD M ORDER BY SEQID DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN >= #{firstIndex} AND RN <= #{lastIndex}

SELECT SEQID ,TITLE ,PASS ,WRITER ,CONTENT ,HITS ,TO_CHAR(RDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE ,TO_CHAR(UDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') UDATE ,(SELECT MAX(SEQID) FROM MYBOARD WHERE SEQID < #{seqid}) BSEQID ,(SELECT MIN(SEQID) FROM MYBOARD WHERE SEQID > #{seqid}) NSEQID FROM MYBOARD WHERE SEQID =#{seqid}
SELECT SEQID ,CMMT ,PASS ,WRITER ,TO_CHAR(RDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE ,PSEQID ,STAR FROM REBOARD WHERE PSEQID = #{pseqid} ORDER BY SEQID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REBOARD WHERE PSEQID =#{seqid}
